thread.section_title: New product topics in Answer HQ
thread.title: Not Letting Me Pick Play

author: FazeCantaloupe
title: Not Letting Me Pick Play
text:
Product : EA SPORTS™ College Football 25
Platform : Xbox Series X
Please specify your platform model. Microsoft Xbox Series X
What is your gamertag/PSN ID?
Date/time issue occurred 4:00 PM
What type of issue do you have? Crash/Freeze
Which mode has this happened in? Road to the College Football Playoff
Summarize your bug While playing my multiplayer match, my game would not let me choose my plays and would force me to receive delay of game penalties until I got kicked. I reconnected my controller and it was not a hardware issue.
How often does the bug occur? Rarely (0% - 9%)
Steps: How can we find the bug ourselves? I do not know
What happens when the bug occurs? I am not able to navigate any UI. Only pausing fixes this but I am limited to 3 pauses per game.
What do you expect to see? Not being able to choose a play on offense or defense.
‌
The game keeps freezing, very annoying forcing losses. Please help me.
